casebody.data:
Andrzej MADURA, et ux., petitioners,
v.
BANK OF AMERICA, N.A. No. 15-8445. Supreme Court of the United States April 18, 2016.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and the petition for a writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
